name: Zakka's Classroom of Failure
description:
"Do you want to learn to fail?"

Zakka's Classroom of Failure is a game that sets you in a school and you need to do challenges such as parkour or mazes to escape! Will you find a way out... or will you learn to fail?

- 2 Player Splitscreen AND 4 Player Online Play Available!

Note : GAME IN  VERY EARLY DEVELOPMENT AND WILL HAVE BUGS! Let us know below any bugs or issues!
